system.prerequisites: Mark of Slaanesh, WP 50+, Psy Rating 6
system.sustained: Target Individual within range who resists Focus Power Test using their Willpower. If they fail, for Psy Rating Rounds the target's darkest impulses overcome them, and they act in accordance with the most destructive side of their personalty. They become immune to Fear, Pinning, Stunning, and Fatigue Effects, and will seek to attack the nearest target to them (be it creature, ally, enemy, etc) with intent to kill them using the most powerful weapons they have. They will not however take suicidal actions such as leaping off buildings, although they will take foolhardy and unneccisary risks.
